entry.title: Covenant tools softfork
entry.summary: A fully functional version of Spacechain, inclusive of the parallel blockchain code and not limited to the Bitcoin-BMM component, is available for use on signet. The project can be accessed at [https://github.com/fiatjaf/soma](https://github.com/fiatjaf/soma). Despite the current lack of active nodes online, users retain the capability to initiate a new chain according to their requirements. This initiative offers an opportunity for individuals interested in exploring advanced blockchain functionalities within a controlled environment.
